mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD_QA_FREE WHERE TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' ORDER BY SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_QA_FREE (SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES((select nvl(max(seq),0)+1 from board), #{title},#{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_QA_FREE SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content} WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
